room_title: Escape room "Jail Break" by Locked Up Lynchburg in Lynchburg
room_description: After being Locked Up in a holding cell for several days, you quickly realize that it is not always innocent until proven guilty. You are being given a life sentence for a heinous crime that you did not commit. With no chance of parole and nothing but the clothes on your back, there is only one way to regain your FREEDOM. Can you escape in time while the guards are on break or will you be locked away for a life sentence?
